attributes.action: Bring out a list to add  all public bodies responsible for failing children
attributes.additional_details: I think my list would help children/families everywhere, 1000s of kids die every year due to being failed by those in power paid to protect them, trying to take action against these bodies is impossible and that’s an injustice, by knowing they can end up on my list by not following their own rule book properly will act as a deter and force them to work to the set standard. This list should be public so employees and public know who are right for the job/role
attributes.background: I want my list to be brought into law, the very thought of this list will make public bodies do their duties more efficiently since there’s a precaution to face for failing to provide the public services your paid for. Children are the future and to protect the future we must protect our children

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about instances where public authorities fail children, but it's not clear in what circumstances you want an authority to be added to the list you propose.

We also cannot accept petitions that make unsubstantiated claims, and we haven't been able to verify your statement that thousands of children die a year because of the failings of public authorities.
